programme.title: Detective Knight: Independence
programme.desc: A vigilante hits close to Knight’s home when he threatens to blow up the city’s Fourth of July festivities.

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: A group of robbers is chased by an FBI agent who uncovers a deeper conspiracy behind the robbery-homicides.

programme.title: Set Up
programme.desc: After a heist, a man is betrayed and vows to get revenge, joining forces with a ruthless crime lord.

programme.title: Force of Nature
programme.desc: A gang of thieves plan a heist during a hurricane, but a cop tries to force everyone inside to evacuate.

programme.title: Bullet Head
programme.desc: A riveting crime story about three career criminals trapped in a warehouse after a heist.

programme.title: Mob Land
programme.desc: A sheriff tries to keep the peace when a man robs a pill mill, alerting an enforcer for the New Orleans mafia.

programme.title: Occupation
programme.desc: A small group of town residents have to band together after a devastating ground invasion.

programme.title: Occupation: Rainfall
programme.desc: Two years after aliens land on Earth, survivors from Sydney, Australia, fight in a desperate war.

programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: After an alien invasion, an unlikely recruit commands Earth's forces and fights for the future of humanity.

programme.title: Guns Akimbo
programme.desc: A guy relies on his newly acquired gladiator skills to save his ex-girlfriend from kidnappers.

programme.title: Drive Angry 3D
programme.desc: John's daughter was murdered, so he escapes hell to rescue his granddaughter, with an FBI agent on his heels.

programme.title: Death Proof
programme.desc: A group of women are stalked by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars for his deadly plans.

programme.title: Planet Terror
programme.desc: After a bio-weapon turns thousands into zombies, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected.
